resources.string: KUKA youBot Android App provide an alternative user interface (UI) for controlling youBot. Unlike "button-type" controller (joypad or keyboard), Android accommodate UI design. Therefore, an intuitive and user friendly controller for KUKA youBot Android can be developed.

KUKA youBot Android App uses RFCOMM Bluetooth connection where Android phone act as the client and youBotAndroid act as the server. youBotandroid is another program which can be run on a machine that is connected to KUKA youBot or KUKA youBot PC. youBot API are implemented in youBotAndroid. Pairing process should be performed before running youBotAndroid.
Currently, Android App can control the base movement of KUKA youBot.

"important note : Pairing process with YouBot device should be executed BEFORE running YouBot API and running Android Controller GUI"
